title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 157.5 - Abatement of non-conforming facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 157.5 - Abatement of non-conforming facilities

State Regulations

Any junkyard or scrap metal processing facility established
or maintained in violation of this Part shall be a public nuisance and shall be
abated and removed in the manner provided by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
157.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
